system.description: This skill allows a character to start a fire without using a tinderbox. A character with a tinderbox and this skill can automatically start fires under ordinary conditions. Without a tinderbox, the character must make a skill check each round, igniting the fire on a 1 or 2 on a 1d6 roll. Adverse conditions, such as high winds or wet wood, require a skill check with penalties as determined by the DM.
